General.Name: Zbom Cabinets Co Ltd
General.Description: Zbom Home Collection Co.,Ltd engages in the research, development, production and sale of custom home furnishing products in China and internationally. It offers integrated kitchen, whole house customization, interior doors/wall panel, and finished furniture matching products. The company was formerly known as Zbom Cabinets Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Zbom Home Collection Co.,Ltd in August 2018. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Hefei, China.
